Chengshou Buddha, Yu Guangming Buddha, Dharma-type Honored Buddha, and Baozang Zhuangyan Buddha.
The names of the 150 Buddhas in the present southern direction.
The Buddha said:

If good men and good women hear the names of the Buddhas in the southern direction, without harboring doubts and with faith and understanding, and pay homage to them, in their present lives they will be endowed with merit and attain five dharmas:
First, they will remove self-attachment and always encounter the Buddha's world;
Second, they will attain the position of a wheel-turning sage king;
Third, they will attain dhÄraá¹‡Ä« and uphold the sÅ«tras with sincere faith;
Fourth, they will accomplish the thirty-two marks of a great man and attain Buddhahood with all practices complete;
Fifth, they will attain the five supernatural powers without obstruction;
These are the five things.

If there are women who hear this Buddha's name and respectfully pay homage with utmost sincerity, they will leave their female bodies and be reborn in a pure Buddha land, endowed with spiritual powers, and be able to eliminate the karma of seven hundred million koá¹­is of kalpas of birth and death.

One hundred and fifty present Buddhas in the southwest.
The Buddha told ÅšÄriputra:

If good men and good women who hear the names of these TathÄgatas have already made offerings to past Buddhas, they should single-mindedly believe and joyfully uphold them. They will transcend the vast and immeasurable joy, establish their minds in true reality, and with a mind of ten thousand kinds of faith and joy, they will think of the TathÄgatas. Those people will attain immeasurable blessings and forever leave far behind the calamities of the three evil paths. After their lives end, they will all be reborn in the Buddha lands of those Buddhas.

When their lives end, those TathÄgatas will hold the great assembly and dwell in front of those people, expounding the Dharma and teaching them, causing them not to regress, and they will certainly attain perfect enlightenment.

If there are those who hear the praise and extolling of the merits and names of these TathÄgatas and give rise to slander, they will fall into hell and undergo various sufferings for a hundred and fifty thousand eons. If there are those who uphold this single-mindedly, without abandoning it, and make obeisance and offerings, they will extinguish the sins of birth and death for a myriad of koá¹­is of eons.

Here are the names of one hundred fifty Buddhas in the present Western Quarter.
The Buddha said:

If there are good men and good women who study the bodhisattva path, hear this Buddha's name, do not give rise to doubt and confusion, and sincerely believe and respect him, wherever they are born, they will attain the samÄdhi of emitting light, and will quickly attain innumerable samÄdhi gates.

At the time of their death, they will also see ten koá¹­is of Buddhas, the Perfectly Enlightened Ones, in each of the ten directions, and will all be able to receive and accept the profound Dharma teachings. Until they attain Buddhahood, they will never forget, and will be able to eliminate the offenses of birth and death for a thousand kalpas, forever abandoning them and not experiencing them again.

The Buddha of Immeasurable Radiance.ğŸ”½Here is the corrected and aligned text:
The names of one hundred and fifty Buddhas in the present northwest.
The Buddha told Ajita:

If sons and daughters of good family hear the names of these Tathagatas, and joyfully believe, delight, receive and uphold them, recite them, and make obeisance to them, they will have already paid homage to five hundred thousand Buddhas.

Wherever they are born, they will always obtain the heavenly eye to see the lands in the ten directions, always obtain the ear to hear immeasurable sounds, their bodies will be able to fly and serve the Buddhas, their minds will always be able to know all thoughts, up to nirvana, they will not be born in lowly or poor places, they will not be born in the three evil destinies or the eight difficult circumstances, their bodies will be like vajra and endowed with the marks of perfection, their minds will delight in the great Dharma and be loved and respected by the assembly, and they will be reborn without leaving the Buddhas.
Therefore, Ajita!

Those who respectfully chant the names of the Buddhas and bow to them will attain immeasurable merit that only the Buddhas can fully know, and will forever escape the sufferings of birth and death for millions of billions of eons.

If sons and daughters of good family who study the bodhisattva vehicle hear the names of these Buddhas, believe and delight in them without doubt, and respectfully serve them with a joyful mind, wherever they are born, they will attain various samÄdhis, see the Buddhas of the ten directions, each as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, and also cause them to be free from all madness in this life, with poisonous resentment eliminated, practicing the Way and progressing daily, with good wishes in their hearts all attained as they think, encountering good and virtuous friends and attaining the profound acceptance of the Dharma, being always respected by people wherever they are born, until attaining Buddhahood they will never experience suffering, and will be able to eliminate the karma of thirty million koá¹­is of nayutas of kalpas of birth and death.

If one hears the name of the Buddha 'Virtuous Inner Abundance and Adornment' and joyfully believes and recites it with a single mind, one will attain irreversibility, quickly achieve perfect enlightenment, eliminate one eon of birth and death, and in future lives attain the six spiritual powers, become upright and handsome, always be respected, be able to eliminate the bonds of desire, have the six faculties always be free from illness, always encounter the Buddha, hear the Dharma, see the Sangha, be free from the eight difficulties, always possess pure precepts, have an undisturbed mind, and attain nirvana.

If one hears the name of the Buddha 'Adamantine Firmness, Subduing and Destroying Adornment' and joyfully believes and recites it, one will attain irreversibility and eliminate the karma of ten trillion eons.
If one hears the name of the Buddha 'Jewel Fire' and joyfully believes and recites it, one will attain irreversibility and quickly achieve perfect enlightenment.

If one hears the name of the Buddha 'Jewel Moon Light' and joyfully upholds and recites it, one will attain a correct and stable state in future lives and see the Buddhas turning the supreme Dharma wheel.
The Buddha Xianzui, if one hears his name and joyfully recites and remembers it, one will be born with a proper appearance, recognize one's past lives, and attain perfect enlightenment.
The Buddha Baolianhuabu, if one hears his name, believes and joyfully recites and remembers it, one will be respected by all in one's place of birth, and one's words and teachings will be accepted.

The Buddha told Shariputra:

If there are sons and daughters of good family who hear the names of these Buddhas, joyfully believe and recite them, and pay homage with respect, the merit they attain surpasses all acts of giving and other merits by a hundred thousand koá¹­is of times. They will be reborn in the Buddha lands of their choice and will not regress in their attainment of perfect enlightenment.
If there are those who slander, harbor doubts, or do not have faith, they will fall into the AvÄ«ci Hell and experience immeasurable suffering for sixty koá¹­Ä«s of years;

Those who have faith and joy, praise, and pay homage will have peace and security in this life and eliminate the offenses of birth and death for hundreds of thousands of myriads of koá¹­Ä«s of kalpas.

The Buddha said:

If sons and daughters of good family who study the vehicle of bodhisattvas hear the names of these Buddhas without a web of attachments in their minds, and those who proclaim what is revealed by the eye of my path, in life after life they will never be lazy, will not practice greed, will always have bodhisattvas as their fathers, wives, children, brothers, and relatives, in every life their bodies will never be apart from the thirty-two marks, they will also be able to be reborn in the lands of the Buddhas, with little desire, anger, and ignorance, their bodies will be free from illness, and they will accomplish all merits, and the karmic offenses of three hundred and fifty myriads of koá¹­Ä«s of eons will all be eliminated.

The Buddha said:

If good sons or good women hear these buddhas' names and sincerely uphold them, burning incense and respectfully bowing, wherever they are born they will attain the universal light samÄdhi. When their lives are about to end, they will naturally see billions of buddhas in front of them, and it will be the same in all ten directions.

Whatever the buddhas say, they will all uphold it and never forget it. Their spiritual powers and awesome movements will benefit innumerable beings, and they will also be able to eliminate the karmic offenses of billions of kalpas of birth and death.
